product.name: Notebook
product.description: A high-quality notebook with lined pages, perfect for note-taking and journaling.

product.name: Correction Tape
product.description: White correction tape for neatly fixing mistakes in documents and notes.

product.name: Paper Clips
product.description: A pack of 100 paper clips for holding documents together.

product.name: Highlighter Set
product.description: A set of 4 colorful highlighters for emphasizing key points in your notes.

product.name: Eraser Pack
product.description: A pack of 3 erasers for erasing pencil marks cleanly and effectively.

product.name: Sticky Notes
product.description: Colorful sticky notes for marking important points and reminders.

product.name: File Folders
product.description: A set of 5 durable file folders for organizing and storing documents.

product.name: Desk Organizer
product.description: An elegant desk organizer to keep your workspace tidy and organized.

product.name: Ballpoint Pen
product.description: A classic ballpoint pen for smooth writing. Ideal for everyday use.

product.name: Pencil Set
product.description: A set of 12 high-quality pencils for drawing and sketching.
